FAQs

Opportunity cost?

What returns you could earn investing the cash instead of paying outright.

Downpayment?

Higher downpayment lowers loan principal and interest.

Insurance effect?

Insurance costs similar; financing may require additional products.

Tax implications?

Usually none for private car purchase; consult local rules.

Liquidity?

Cash purchase reduces liquidity buffer.
